title: Welcome to this stunning 2 bedroom, 2 full and one half bath
posting_body: ['Welcome to this stunning 2 bedroom, 2 full and one half bath with a private entrance.', 'The first floor offers a wonderful open floor plan.', 'The kitchen boasts stainless appliances and tons of cabinets.', 'All rooms have been freshly painted.', 'Full basement with great storage.', 'Upstairs laundry.', 'Private space in the rear yard', 'Amenities:', '- Parking', '- Unfurnished', '- Smoke Free', '- Basement', '- Yard', '- Patio', '- Other amenities - snow and lawn car included', 'Appliances:', '- Air Conditioning', '- Dishwasher', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Microwave', '- Range', '- Refrigerator', '- Oven', '- Washer & Dryer', 'LeaseLengths:', '- 12 Months lease', '- 24 Months lease', 'Pets:', '- No Pets Allowed', 'Utilities:', '- Water Included', '- Trash Pick-up', 'Included', '- Resident Pays Electricity', '- Resident Pays Gas', '- High-Speed Internet Available', 'Contact 21 UNITED REALTY at', 'show contact info', 'for more information']
